name: "Users Cheaters Theatres" Album
description: "Users Cheaters Theatres" Album FUJI MINX' debut concept album contains 20 tracks, 16 page full-color booklet with lyrics, photos, and more. Only 200 left of this 1st Issue printing. Get your copy before we sell out! Reviews: "FIVE STARS...Users Cheaters Theatres is easily one of the few masterpieces of 2007." - Jason Thompson, Bullz-Eye Magazine "Users Cheaters Theatres, is a sonic landscaping of sensual melodies that encompasses the dark caverns of addictions to the open flame of redemption and hope...For a debut album, Users Cheaters Theatres is a surprisingly sophisticated production. And like both the album and their live shows, Fuji Minx successfully takes us on a gradual, exhausting journey through hell and back punctuated by sophisticated ideas that gives each of us insight to our own personal demons." -PICKSYSTICKS.com "'But No No No' is a really great song that deserves to riding the airwaves! A cool band that has lots of potential for sure!" -Kaj Roth, Melodic.net "The credits are rolling on the movie soundtrack of my life. I like it! I picture this being played at my funeral." -Frank Kramer, Host of the "Frosty, Heidi, & Frank" Radio Show "I LOVED it! I thought it was sexy, sultry. It made me wanna get drunk and and naked with the right guy! I LOVED it!" -Crysta Garner, Producer of the "Frosty, Heidi, & Frank" Radio Show

name: "Autoerotic Fatality" HeartCuffs Necklace by Hello Drama
description:
Created for FUJI MINX by Hello Drama for the "Autoerotic Fatality" Album.

A pair of 1.25" by 1.25" heart shaped handcuffs. 4 Czech stones embedded in silver glitter enamel. 16" sterling silver chain.

"Two hearts that beat as one"
